definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="String" id="pageNumberText">pageNumberText</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="variables_set_text"><field name="VAR">local:pageNumberText</field><value name="VAL"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="2"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Page </field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="text_format_number"><value name="number"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">global:pageNumber</field></block></value><value name="format"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">##</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><next><block type="call_procedure"><field name="procedure">RawIronNGuide</field></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
